author: Cheryl Hilvert
text:
What types of leading practice research and education are you interested in?  Let us know either by responding to this inquiry or through the Center for Management Strategies blog on leading practices for local government managers at    http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blog/50/Center_for_Management_Strategies
Ideas for leading practice research can also be posted at the CMS user group which can be accessed at http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/groups/kn/group/1302
CMS is interested in receiving your input on the types of leading practices that we should pursue in the future.  What would you like to know about?
title: What types of leading practice research are you interested in?
